verses.text: For behold, the day cometh, that \add shall\add* burn as an oven; And all the proud, yea, and all that do wickedly, shall be stubble: And the day that cometh shall burn them up, saith the \sc Lord\sc* of hosts, That it shall leave them neither root nor branch.
But unto you that fear my name shall the Sun of righteousness arise With healing in his wings; And ye shall go forth, and grow up as calves of the stall.
And ye shall tread down the wicked; For they shall be ashes under the soles of your feet In the day that I \add shall\add* do \add this\add*, saith the \sc Lord\sc* of hosts.
Remember ye the law of Moses my servant, Which I commanded unto him in Horeb for all Israel, \add With\add* the statutes and judgments.
Behold, I \add will\add* send you Elijah the prophet Before the coming of the great and dreadful day of the \sc Lord\sc*:
And he shall turn the heart of the fathers to the children, And the heart of the children to their fathers, Lest I come and smite the earth \add with\add* a curse.
